nodes.label: Social connection reduces mortality risk by 50%
nodes.summary: Holt-Lunstad et al. (2010) meta-analysis of 148 studies with 308,849 participants found social connection reduces mortality risk by 50% (OR=1.50, 95% CI 1.42-1.59). Effect comparable to smoking cessation, exceeds obesity and physical inactivity. Replicated across cultures.

nodes.label: Global Workspace Theory
nodes.summary: Consciousness theory that predicts prefrontal ignition during conscious processing. Failed specific predictions in Cogitate Consortium (2025) multi-lab pre-registered study across 6 labs testing GWT and IIT.
